item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Real Madrid plot Vinícius Júnior exit
item.description: Vinícius Júnior's days at Real Madrid could be numbered. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Magic's Bane tossed after firing ball at Okongwu
item.description: Desmond Bane was ejected Tuesday after committing a hard foul on Onyeka Okongwu and firing the ball at the Hawks' center while he fell to the floor.
